statements.sql:
update `frontends` set `data_values` = '{\"has_image\":[\"1\"],\"title\":\"Olympic Swimmer Donates Blood for the First Time at BloodLab\",\"description_nic\":\"

Jules Avila,\u00a0an Afro-Latina Olympic Swimmer<\/em>, stepped out of the pool and into a Blood Lab donor center to donate blood for the first time. She was inspired to lead by example after learning of the growing need for more Hispanic blood donors.\u00a0<\/p>

How did you get involved in competitive swimming?<\/span><\/p>

I first got involved in swimming because my mom wanted to learn. She took me to her lessons, and that\u2019s where I first started my love of the water. Then I got involved in the YMCA and community pools and that\u2019s when I started competing. I loved racing and making new friends, especially in Honduras. From there at the age of 5, I\u2019ve been racing and swimming ever since!\u00a0<\/p>

<\/p>

Who is an Olympian you admire and why?<\/span><\/p>

An Olympian I admire is\u00a0Thomas Daley<\/a><\/span><\/u>. He\u2019s a diver who until recently won his first Olympic gold medal. His first Olympics was 2008 when he was very young. He kept working and pushing and though the results were not always what he wanted he never gave up. He won his first Olympic gold medal 13 years later in Tokyo 2021. He\u2019s an excellent example of determination and great work ethic - that if you keep believing and working hard for your goal you can achieve it.<\/p>

<\/p>

What would you say to someone who has never donated blood before to motivate them?<\/span><\/p>

I would speak about my excellent experience and share with them where they can go. I would also speak on how one feels after donating - knowing that you are helping others and that one donation of blood can save up to 3 lives. In addition, after my last donation, I received an\u00a0email<\/u><\/span><\/a>\u00a0about how my donation was being sent to someone to help their lives for the better - it was an amazing feeling!<\/p>

<\/p>

Watch to see Jules donate blood for the first time:<\/u><\/span><\/p>

<\/p><\/div>


<\/div>\",\"blog_image\":\"63dad19d9a5b51675284893.png\"}', `frontends`.`updated_at` = '2023-02-01 20:56:26' where `id` = 73
bindings: {"has_image":["1"],"title":"Olympic Swimmer Donates Blood for the First Time at BloodLab","description_nic":"<p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\">Jules Avila,<em>\u00a0an Afro-Latina Olympic Swimmer<\/em>, stepped out of the pool and into a Blood Lab donor center to donate blood for the first time. She was inspired to lead by example after learning of the growing need for more Hispanic blood donors.\u00a0<\/p><div><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><span style=\"font-weight:700;\">How did you get involved in competitive swimming?<\/span><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\">I first got involved in swimming because my mom wanted to learn. She took me to her lessons, and that\u2019s where I first started my love of the water. Then I got involved in the YMCA and community pools and that\u2019s when I started competing. I loved racing and making new friends, especially in Honduras. From there at the age of 5, I\u2019ve been racing and swimming ever since!\u00a0<\/p><p style=\"margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><span style=\"font-weight:700;\">Who is an Olympian you admire and why?<\/span><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\">An Olympian I admire is\u00a0<u><span style=\"font-weight:700;\"><a href=\"https:\/\/olympics.com\/en\/athletes\/thomas-daley\" style=\"color:rgb(220,53,69);\">Thomas Daley<\/a><\/span><\/u>. He\u2019s a diver who until recently won his first Olympic gold medal. His first Olympics was 2008 when he was very young. He kept working and pushing and though the results were not always what he wanted he never gave up. He won his first Olympic gold medal 13 years later in Tokyo 2021. He\u2019s an excellent example of determination and great work ethic - that if you keep believing and working hard for your goal you can achieve it.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><span style=\"font-weight:700;\">What would you say to someone who has never donated blood before to motivate them?<\/span><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\">I would speak about my excellent experience and share with them where they can go. I would also speak on how one feels after donating - knowing that you are helping others and that one donation of blood can save up to 3 lives. In addition, after my last donation, I received an\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/www.oneblood.org\/journey\/\" style=\"color:rgb(220,53,69);\"><span style=\"font-weight:700;\"><u>email<\/u><\/span><\/a>\u00a0about how my donation was being sent to someone to help their lives for the better - it was an amazing feeling!<\/p><p style=\"margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><span style=\"font-weight:700;\"><u>Watch to see Jules donate blood for the first time:<\/u><\/span><\/p><p style=\"text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;\"><\/p><\/div><div style=\"text-align:justify;\"><br \/><\/div>","blog_image":"63dad19d9a5b51675284893.png"}

  "title" => "Olympic Swimmer Donates Blood for the First Time at BloodLab"
  "description_nic" => "<p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;">Jules Avila,<em> an Afro-Latina Olympic Swimmer</em>, stepped out of the pool and into a Blood Lab donor center to donate blood for the first time. She was inspired to lead by example after learning of the growing need for more Hispanic blood donors. </p><div><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"><span style="font-weight:700;">How did you get involved in competitive swimming?</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;">I first got involved in swimming because my mom wanted to learn. She took me to her lessons, and that’s where I first started my love of the water. Then I got involved in the YMCA and community pools and that’s when I started competing. I loved racing and making new friends, especially in Honduras. From there at the age of 5, I’ve been racing and swimming ever since! </p><p style="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"><span style="font-weight:700;">Who is an Olympian you admire and why?</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;">An Olympian I admire is <u><span style="font-weight:700;"><a href="https://olympics.com/en/athletes/thomas-daley" style="color:rgb(220,53,69);">Thomas Daley</a></span></u>. He’s a diver who until recently won his first Olympic gold medal. His first Olympics was 2008 when he was very young. He kept working and pushing and though the results were not always what he wanted he never gave up. He won his first Olympic gold medal 13 years later in Tokyo 2021. He’s an excellent example of determination and great work ethic - that if you keep believing and working hard for your goal you can achieve it.</p><p style="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"><span style="font-weight:700;">What would you say to someone who has never donated blood before to motivate them?</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;">I would speak about my excellent experience and share with them where they can go. I would also speak on how one feels after donating - knowing that you are helping others and that one donation of blood can save up to 3 lives. In addition, after my last donation, I received an <a href="https://www.oneblood.org/journey/" style="color:rgb(220,53,69);"><span style="font-weight:700;"><u>email</u></span></a> about how my donation was being sent to someone to help their lives for the better - it was an amazing feeling!</p><p style="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"><span style="font-weight:700;"><u>Watch to see Jules donate blood for the first time:</u></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:12.5px;margin-left:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;"></p></div><div style="text-align:justify;"><br></div>"
]
